briefTitle: Two Different Antibiotic Agents to Treat Generalized Aggressive Periodontitis

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Clinical Attachment Level (CAL)
outcomeMeasures.description: Evaluate the difference between baseline and 6 months CAL measures.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Probing Depth (PB)
outcomeMeasures.description: Evaluate the difference between baseline and 6 months PB measures.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Bleeding on Probe (BoP)
outcomeMeasures.description: Evaluate the difference between baseline and 6 months BoP measures.

outcomeMeasures.title: Compliance
outcomeMeasures.description: After 7 days of periodontal treatment, patients will be asked to return any medication not taken and/or the empty bottles. The number of pills not taken by the subject will be documented in order to evaluate compliance.

outcomeMeasures.title: Adverse Effects That May be Related to Antibiotic Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients will be instructed to fill a self-report form about any possible adverse effects in order to help evaluate their adherence to the systemic antimicrobial regimen.
